title: Military Mail
description: In this episode, our hosts Dale and Yasmine are joined by Lynn Heidelbaugh, Curator at the Smithsonian National Postal Museum, to talk about military mail. We’ll learn more about how mail became such an important part of US military history, and how it’s evolved over time to meet the changing landscape of the armed forces. We’ll also discuss how you and members of the armed forces can use it to send mail, and more!
author: mediacenter@usps.gov (United States Postal Service)
